mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_dish_order ( id, weid, storeid, from_user, totalprice, ordersn, status, ispay, paytype, transid, username, address, tel, meal_time, counts, seat_type, carports, realprice, dining_mode, remark, taste, tableid, print_sta, isticket, title, dateline, crter, crtdate, opter, optdate, deleted ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{weid}, #{storeid}, #{from_user}, #{totalprice}, #{ordersn}, #{status}, #{ispay}, #{paytype}, #{transid}, #{username}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{meal_time}, #{counts}, #{seat_type}, #{carports}, #{realprice}, #{dining_mode}, #{remark}, #{taste}, #{tableid}, #{print_sta}, #{isticket}, #{title}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sysdate()), #{crter}, sysdate(), #{opter}, sysdate(), 0 )

INSERT INTO wx_dish_order_detail ( did, oid, goods_id, num, price, cost, crter, crtdate, opter, optdate, deleted ) VALUES
(replace(uuid(),'-',''),#{item.oid},#{item.goods_id},#{item.num},#{item.price},#{item.cost},#{item.crter},sysdate(),#{item.opter},sysdate(),0)

INSERT INTO wx_dish_order_detail ( did, oid, goods_id, num, price, cost, crter, crtdate, opter, optdate, deleted ) VALUES ( replace(uuid(),'-',''), #{oid}, #{goods_id}, #{num}, #{price}, #{cost}, #{crter}, sysdate(), #{opter}, sysdate(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT detail.did, detail.oid, detail.dno, detail.goods_id, detail.num, detail.price, detail.cost, detail.crter, detail.crtdate, detail.opter, detail.optdate, detail.deleted, goods.title goods_name FROM wx_dish_order_detail detail right join wx_dish_order ord on ord.id = detail.oid inner join wx_dish_goods goods on goods.id = detail.goods_id where ord.deleted = 0 and detail.deleted = 0 and goods.deleted = 0 and detail.oid = #{oid}
select ifnull(sum(price*num),0) as totalprice from wx_dish_order_detail detail where detail.deleted = 0 and detail.oid = #{oid}
